summary: Fix of Dawnguard DLC Normal Map
descriptionHtml:
Required:
Dawnguard DLC
Can be use with official \"High-Resolution Texture Pack\" DLC*

*seem that they forgot to convert this texture in High-Resolution Texture Pack :P

For any one that use \"Skyrim Realistic Overhaul + Dawnguard\" you probably don\'t need this fix.

Credit:
BSAopt
7zip
Gimp and gimp-dds
Bethesda Softworks

Change log:
1.0 convert seruinsmarble01_n.tga to seruinsmarble01_n.dds BC3/DTX5 with mipmap
author: StargrazerWolf1337
